ingredients.ingredient: 8 ounces small fresh mozzarella balls, drained
¼ cup vinaigrette or Italian salad dressing
1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil or Italian parsley
4 ounces deli-sliced Margherita® Deli Hard Salami or Genoa Salami
4 ounces sliced Margarita® Mortadella or Hot or Sweet Capicola
½ cup bottled roasted red and/or yellow bell peppers
Toasted sliced Italian or French bread baguette or sturdy flat crackers

cookingTips: Arrange items by color and texture for visual appeal—alternate meats with cheeses and vegetables
Remove mozzarella from refrigerator 15 minutes before serving for best flavor
Drizzle vinaigrette over mozzarella and peppers just before serving to keep bread items crisp
